name: Infection War
description:
Presented By:

Sherif : Game Designer

Saleh : Game Developper

Nassim : Game Developper

Story:

  Protect the body from germs to win the game and save your owner's life

Control:

  W, A, S, D : movement

  Left Mouse Button : Shoot

  Right Mouse Button : Aim

  R : Reload

 Shift : sprint

  Space : Jump

Attributions:

    Map parts + sound effects + visual effects:

    https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/tutorials/creator-kit-fps-149310

    Character Mesh:   

   https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/karting-microgame-150956?_gl=1*1...
